籤詩版本二:
Intwasahlobo iyeza, izimbali ziyaqhakaza kuvulandi, futhi izimoto ezihamba izinkulungwane zamakhilomitha ziletha ingcebo.
Uma uthola igagasi lezinga lesithathu le-Yumen, lizoba njengokuduma phansi
詩意:
Le hexagram imele isithombe sokuhlangana nombusi enkantolo.
Konke kuhle kakhulu.
解曰:
Kwabekwa umbusi. Njengengcebo etholakala ebumpofu. Landela inhliziyo yakho. Eyokuqala phakathi kwe-hexagrams.
Lesi sibonakaliso silandela isifiso senhliziyo yakho. Konke kuhamba kahle.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ama-yuan amathathu ebhizinisini
U-Shang Ren (1414-1486), igama lokuhlonipha u-Hongzai, isiteketiso u-Suting, isihloko se-posthumous u-Wenyi, wayengowokuzalwa e-Chun'an, e-Zhejiang, e-China. Wazalwa ngoFebhuwari 25, unyaka weshumi nambili kaYongle eMing Dynasty.
Uyise noma amadlozi akhe babengebona izikhulu, kodwa wayethandwa isazi uWang Rui eminyakeni yakhe yokuqala. Ngonyaka weshumi kaXuande eMing Dynasty (1435), wakleliswa endaweni yokuqala ezivivinyweni zesifundazwe (Xie Yuan). , wehluleka izikhathi eziningi ezivivinyweni, ngakho wazinikela ekutadisheni i-Taixue, futhi wayethandwa kakhulu i-Imperial Academy. ), wabe esekleliswa kuqala esivivinyweni seSigodlo (Zhuangyuan). Ebukhosini baseMing, ngu-Huang Guan kuphela kanye naye, abaxoshwa nguZhu Di, ababenalolu dumo.
聖意: Inhlanhla ekhaya, inhlanhla, inhlanhla ebhizinisini, inhlanhla emshadweni, impumelelo eLiujia, izindaba ezinhle kubahambi, izindaba ezinhle emasimini, imisundu, imfuyo ephumelelayo, ukuthola abantu, ukubuyisela, amacala, impumelelo, ukufuduka, okuhle nhlanhla ngezifo, amathuna e-Anshan
